column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Friday March 5 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Lane Closure Scheduled for E Main St:
column4: Friday March 5 from 9:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m. (times approximate).

column3: Lane Closure Scheduled for E Main St:
column4: The right lane is currently closed just past N MLK in front of the Pam Miller Downtown Arts Center for a memorial event at 10:00 a.m.

column3: Lane Closure Scheduled for E Main St:
column4: Pedestrians will be directed to the sidewalk on the south side (Public Library side).
